articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: UPDATE 1-Indian court refuses to lift deadline for Kotak Mahindra stake dilution - TV
articles.description: An Indian court refused to stay the central bank order forcing Kotak Mahindra Bank Chief Executive Uday Kotak to dilute his stake in the company he founded, news channel CNBC TV18 reported on Monday, sending shares of the lender sliding nearly 4 percent.
articles.content: (Adds shares, background) MUMBAI, Dec 17 (Reuters) - An Indian court refused to stay the central bank order forcing Kotak Mahindra Bank Chief Executive Uday Kotak to dilute his stake in the company he founded, news channel CNBC TV18 reported on Monday, sendin… [+1364 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank surges on report of likely Berkshire investment
articles.description: Shares of India's Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd posted their sharpest surge in nearly nine years on Friday following a report that billionaire investor Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc is planning to pick up a 10 percent stake in the bank.
articles.content: (Reuters) - Shares of India’s Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd ( KTKM.NS ) posted their sharpest surge in nearly nine years on Friday following a report that billionaire investor Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc ( BRKa.N ) is planning to pick up a 10 percent st… [+1241 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank jumps on report of Berkshire investment
articles.description: Shares of India's Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd jumped as much as 8 percent on Friday after CNBC-TV18 reported that Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc is planning to invest about $4 billion to $6 billion in the bank.
articles.content: (Reuters) - Shares of India’s Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd jumped as much as 8 percent on Friday after CNBC-TV18 reported that Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc is planning to invest about $4 billion to $6 billion in the bank. Berkshire Hathaway may invest i… [+412 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank challenges RBI decision on preference shares
articles.description: Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd said on Monday it had challenged in court the central bank's decision to not allow its promoter to issue preference shares to reduce stake in the private-sector lender.
articles.content: (Reuters) - Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd said on Monday it had challenged in court the central bank’s decision to not allow its promoter to issue preference shares to reduce stake in the private-sector lender. Uday Kotak, the billionaire head of Kotak Mahindra Ban… [+543 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: High Court refuses to stay deadline for Kotak Mahindra Bank stake dilution: CNBC TV18
articles.description: Bombay High Court refused to stay the central bank's decision to not allow promoter stake sale in Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd and said it would hear the case next on January 17, news channel CNBC TV18 reported on Monday.
articles.content: MUMBAI (Reuters) - Bombay High Court refused to stay the central bank’s decision to not allow promoter stake sale in Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd and said it would hear the case next on January 17, news channel CNBC TV18 reported on Monday. The bank last week chal… [+462 chars]

articles.author: Krishna V Kurup
articles.title: Nifty, Sensex rise; Kotak Mahindra Bank sees best day in nearly 9 years
articles.description: Indian shares edged up on Friday, recovering from sharp losses in the previous session, boosted by a report that Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc might take a stake in private-sector lender Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.
articles.content: (Reuters) - Indian shares edged up on Friday, recovering from sharp losses in the previous session, boosted by a report that Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc might take a stake in private-sector lender Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. Meanwhile, broader Asian … [+1633 chars]

articles.content: Dec 7 (Reuters) - The following bids, mergers, acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2100 GMT on Friday: ** Activist investor Elliott has taken a position in Germany’s Bayer, the latest in a string of investments in German companies, three people famili… [+2715 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Expert Views: In surprise move, RBI Governor Urjit Patel steps down
articles.description: The Reserve Bank of India's Governor, Urjit Patel, resigned for "personal reasons" on Monday, a decision analysts linked to the intense pressure on the central bank from the government to ease regulatory curbs.
articles.content: NEW DELHI (Reuters) - The Reserve Bank of India’s Governor, Urjit Patel, resigned for “personal reasons” on Monday, a decision analysts linked to the intense pressure on the central bank from the government to ease regulatory curbs. The government and the RBI… [+5372 chars]
